content:
Hi, my phone was reset months ago and all TOTP tokens was lost.
I try to access the LLVM reviews website but they always require the TOTP token.
Resetting password option also asks for the token.
I found this help page: https://secure.phabricator.com/book/phabricator/article/multi_factor_auth/#administration-recovering-from
But what email/address should I contact to gain my access?
I think this stream belongs to #general but I cannot move it.

Opened a topic in LLVM discourse group: https://llvm.discourse.group/t/lost-llvm-phabricator-totp-how-to-regain-access-to-llvm-review-site/1573
Hopefully this should help.
